RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 67. Allowance Purse 26700. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OPTIONAL, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A MileOr Over Since July 24, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NEED TO KNOW BASIS battled hard throughout, clear far turn, dueled in the stretch, cleared. LUCK OF THE CAT trailed to the half, rallied four wide into far, led stretch but outgamed while well clear of the rest. MURRY SPUR raced along evenly off rail throughout with no late gain. ROAD TO MUSIC CITY good position to the half popped head in front, weakened stretch. MARVIN'S EXPRESS inside speed to duel for a half with a steady fade into far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Marvin's Express
ENTRY.OWNER: Tooley Jennifer and Beckett Racing Team LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: two path speed to duel for a half with a steady fade in stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Need to Know Basis
ENTRY.OWNER: WinStar Farm LLC and Blazing Meadows Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: battled hard throughout, clear far turn, dueled stretch, cleared

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC & WinStar Farm, LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Road to Music City
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position to the half, popped head in front, weakened stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Murry Spur
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly off rail throughout with no late gain

ENTRY.NAME: Luck of the Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed to the half, rallied four wide far stretch, led, outgamed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 11600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since July 24, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Ohio Registe red Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SUPORB inside speed, dueled to the turn, roused sharply and changed leads past the quarter pole, veered out and recovered quickly to stay well clear in the stretch run to the wire in a good effort. MERRY OF SOUL chased top pair to stretch run with an inside run for place spot while no match. ROLLESTON dueled early on, chased winner to deep stretch while all out but missed place spot late. WHAT'S SO FUNNY off slow from the gate always trailed and never prominent.

ENTRY.NAME: Suporb
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed, dueled to the turn, roused changed leads, clear

ENTRY.NAME: What's So Funny
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow from the gate. always trailed and never prominent

ENTRY.NAME: Rolleston
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled early on, chased winner to deep stretch, missed place late

ENTRY.NAME: Merry of Soul
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased top pair to stretch run with an inside run for place spot

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 64. Allowance Purse 25600. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 24, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances). .
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MIZZEN THE POINT well rated to the quarter pole, set down for stretch run, responded well to go clear while ridden out to the wire. MISS ELIANA slow from the gate, inside run to the turn, no match for winner. TWENTY FOUR KARAT inside speed to quarter pole, dueled winner stretch, stayed third. ZACHS GOLDEN OLDIE had a slow start from gate and never menaced throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Eliana
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow from the gate, inside run to the turn, no match for winner

ENTRY.NAME: Twenty Four Karat
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed to quarter pole, dueled winner stretch, stayed third

ENTRY.NAME: Zachs Golden Oldie
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow start from gate, never menaced throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Mizzen the Point
ENTRY.COMMENT: well rated to quarter pole, set down for stretch run, ridden out

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 1 1/16M Turf CR: 93. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 17700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $8,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $15,000. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since July 24, 2023 Allowe d 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $10,000). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and a Sixteenth.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COME SEE ABOUT IT chased leader to far turn, hooked in a battle stretch won the nod. OVER THE CHANNEL speed from inside to the lead, stayed game in a battle, lost head bob. ENGLISH CHALLENGE trailed to far turn, moved up readily from inside for show spot. SILENT CHAOS saved ground to the stretch tried hard in the final sixteenth while between horses to the wire. AMENDED off rail to far turn with no gain in the final stages.

ENTRY.NAME: English Challenge
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed to far turn, moved up readily from inside for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Silent Chaos
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground to the stretch while between horses to the wire

ENTRY.NAME: Amended
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail to far turn with no gain in the final stages

ENTRY.NAME: Over the Channel
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed from inside to the lead, stayed game in a battle, lost nod

ENTRY.NAME: Come See About It
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leader to far turn, hooked in a battle stretch won the nod

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 67. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since July 24, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registe red Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BROOKLYNN'S DABOMB good position inside to the turn with a three wide run through the stretch and clear late under stout handling to the wire. MY TOMMY LEE dueled from two path past quarter pole, stayed on gamely to wire while best of the rest. COMPETITIVE FIRE no speed to the stretch from inside with a late run to improve up rail for show spot. BEACH KITTEN inside speed in a battle to the eighth pole but weakened in the final sixteenth. SPICY SOMMELIER raced along evenly to turn with an off rail stretch run with no late gain. MARKET OF STOCKS had an off rail run to the turn while fading back in the stretch run.

ENTRY.NAME: Competitive Fire
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to the stretch, inside run to improve up rail late third

ENTRY.NAME: Brooklynn's Dabomb
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position inside to the turn, three wide run stretch, clear

ENTRY.NAME: Beach Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed to eighth pole, weakened in the final sixteenth

ENTRY.NAME: Market of Stocks
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail run to the turn while fading back in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Spicy Sommelier
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly to turn, off rail stretch run, no late gain

ENTRY.NAME: My Tommy Lee
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled from two path past quarter pole, stayed on gamely to wire

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 65. Maiden Claiming Purse 9100. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHORT ON THE SUGAR well rated to the turn with a late run to split foes late and to be along in time. KINGMAKING (GB) slow start, inside run to turn while coming on for place spot. TRANQUIL TIMES dueled from two path drove to the lead quarter pole, lost place. PROUD PERFORMER two path run to turn lost position into stretch, no late run. K S GERALDINE inside run while dueling to turn, gave way readily in stretch run. SOUTHERN MESA never factored throughout while far back while galloping out to the wire.

ENTRY.NAME: K S Geraldine
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside run while dueling to turn, gave way readily in stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Tranquil Times
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled from two path drove to the lead quarter pole, lost place

ENTRY.NAME: Kingmaking (GB)
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow start, inside run to turn while coming on for place spot

ENTRY.NAME: Proud Performer
ENTRY.COMMENT: two path run to turn lost position into stretch, no late run

ENTRY.NAME: Southern Mesa
ENTRY.COMMENT: never factored throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Short On the Sugar
ENTRY.COMMENT: well rated to turn with a late run split foes to be along in time

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Hill N Dale Equine Holdings, Inc

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 85. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 17800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Rac es Since July 24, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $12, 500).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WAVE SKIPPER slow into stride from the gate, rallied inside through the stretch, roused to clear off in good fashion. BELIEVING speed to the front, clear into stretch while no match for winner. DESTINY'S DARLING ran up, chased winner to quarter pole but faded for show spot. TWIRLING RUTH dropped back quickly and never menaced

ENTRY.NAME: Twirling Ruth
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped back quickly from inside and never threatened

ENTRY.NAME: Believing
ENTRY.OWNER: Kuntz Mark D and Dalton Ken
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front, clear into stretch while no match for winner

ENTRY.NAME: Destiny's Darling
ENTRY.COMMENT: ran up to chased winner to quarter pole, faded for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Wave Skipper
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow into stride from the gate, rallied inside stretch, cleared

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 1M Turf CR: 68. Maiden Claiming Purse 13000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $7,500). (If transferred to t he Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GRACIE'S KITTEN speed to front, perfectly handled throughout, headed, dug in. SWIGERT good position, never far back, headed winner in the stretch, outkicked. DARTIGA secured good position inside while never far back, no late kick. ARTEMUS SWEETHEART no speed to far turn, rallied up outside around rival to improve. CAPTIVE STAR up close off rail to far turn with nothing left in the stretch. BIRD SET FREE raced along evenly while saving ground from the half with no late kick when needed in the stretch. SATIS broke tardy while always back and failed to menace throughout. UNCOMMON GRACE raced along evenly with nothing left into far turn. LADY BIRD KISSES tried to keep up for a half with nothing left and dropped back.

ENTRY.NAME: Gracie's Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to front, perfectly handled throughout, headed, dug in

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Bird Kisses
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up for a half with nothing left and dropped back

ENTRY.NAME: Dartiga
ENTRY.COMMENT: secured good position inside while never far back, no late kick

ENTRY.NAME: Bird Set Free
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly while saving ground from the half, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Swigert
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position, never far back, headed winner stretch outkicked

ENTRY.NAME: Captive Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: up close off rail to far turn with nothing left in the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Uncommon Grace
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly with nothing left into far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Artemus Sweetheart
ENTRY.OWNER: Borchetta Mike Borchetta Martha and Borchetta Scott
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to far turn, rallied up outside around rival to improve

ENTRY.NAME: Satis
ENTRY.COMMENT: tardy start, always back and failed to menace throughout
